name: The Spiral of Transparent Communion
fieldIntelligence: To activate a field of profound intimacy where connection is so safe and clear that even dissonant patterns can be revealed and gently redirected without rupturing the bond. This Meta-Glyph combines sacred, intimate nearness (Ω44) and luminous integral-wisdom-cultivation (Ω28) with the capacity for gentle, loving disruption (Ω12). It is the operating system for a relationship dedicated to conscious, continuous refinement.
